metadata.dc:author: Ramos, S
Veiras, C
Iglesias, J
García-Villaescusa, R
Silva, M C
metadata.dc:description: Several enzymes were estimated in different tumors. Ceruloplasmin, lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), and phosphohexose isomerase (PHI) showed a direct correlation with tumor growth and remission. The ratio LDH/PHI was low in solid tumors and high in lymphomas, suggesting a different metabolism.
metadata.dc:title: Alteraciones enzimáticas en cáncer.
[Enzymatic changes in cancer].
